name: Cult Carnage
description:
My submission for LudumDare45: Cult Carnage!

A bullet-hell shooter where you start with nothing but your fists.

Credits:

  • All SFX comes from 512 Sound Effects (8-bit Style) by SubspaceAudio: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
  • Game music is "Final/Boss Battle #1", by nene: https://opengameart.org/content/finalboss-battle-1
  • Font is the Spectre premium font by Eeve Somepx: https://www.patreon.com/somepx/posts
  • Pallete used is the Fleja Master Palette, by Fleja: https://lospec.com/palette-list/fleja-master-palette
  • All pixel art shown is my own.

Thanks for playing!
